dc_title_s: Map of Minnesota : with population and location of principal towns and cities
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale [1:1,287,000] (W 97°--W 90°/N 49°--N 43°). Congressional and township boundaries shown in red and blue respectively. On verso: index of cities and towns with location and population (1905 census). "Our lands are located within a few miles of the richest Iron Mines in the world. Therefore the Farmer has the best markets. The country with in the circle [around Grand Rapids] is very rich and proserous. New mines are just beginning to open up"--advertising text on recto.
